attributes.action: Get the Scottish out of westminster!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many Scottish people in westminster making decision about England, this includes the PM himself. We want less scottish people in these key positions as they have their own parliament and should go back up their and get involved in that instead.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
